definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to a subdivision of Afroasiatic Semitic languages : Amharic , Arabic , Aramaic , Syriac , Akkadian , Hebrew , Maltese , Tigrigna , Phoenician etc.
Of or pertaining to the Semites ; of or pertaining to one or more Semitic peoples.

subdefinitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the descendants of Shem , the eldest of three sons of Noah .
Of or pertaining to the Israeli , Jewish , or Hebrew people.
Of or pertaining to any of the religions which originated among the Semites; Abrahamic .

main_definition: Of or pertaining to a subdivision of Afroasiatic Semitic languages : Amharic , Arabic , Aramaic , Syriac , Akkadian , Hebrew , Maltese , Tigrigna , Phoenician etc.
secondary_definitions: Of or pertaining to the Semites ; of or pertaining to one or more Semitic peoples.
